overview: 'Collective Economy. Europe's last revolution' is a documentary that takes an depht look into a recent and almost unknown historical episode: the seizure and collective management by the workers of 80% of the industry and services in Catalonia between 1936 and 1939. This is one of the most radical and innovative transformations of the 20Th Century. A unique revolution. The last in Europe.
title: Collective Economy. Europe's last revolution
